body.p:
Stanford Ky Aug 23rd 1865
Hon Thomas. E. Bramlet
Govenor of Kentucky

My object of the enclosed few lines is simply for the benefit of others that is soldiers of Major Bridgewaters. Halls Gap Battalion who furnished their own Horses arming their the service paid their own money and was their own private property for the benifit of the above mentioned person I call upon your to Excellency for Information to know which steps will have to be taken to obtain their pay for their service of their Horses or whether it will be worthwhile to take any. That is may they expect to obtain anything.
Enclosed find Stamp which you will confer a favor by answering immediately

I am Respectfulley
Yours
Mr. Presley Martin
Stanford Ky
Desires to Know if the soldiers of Maj Bridgewaters command who furnished their own horses -- will be paid for them.
Will answer immediately is the request This ex soldiers in distress

L B No 16 -- 1865 P. 304
Recd A. G. O Aug 25" 1865
